job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pPosition Sr Machine Learning EngineerppLocation Palo Alto CA Remote until Covid19 but preferred Locals to CAppDuration Contract or Contract to HireppnbspppAbout the RoleppThe Sr Machine Learning Engineer position is responsible for researching building and maintaining Machine Learning models for a largescale distributed cloud platform to deliver application privacyppcapabilities The ideal candidate is also expected to mentor and work with a remarkably high performing software teamppnbspppResponsibilitiesppAs a senior staff member of a fastgrowing earlystage startup the Sr ML Engineer will be accountable for Machine Learning and AI of the Data Secrets platformpulliResearch build and maintain Machine Learning models for highly scalable performant and available platformliliIntegrate new data sources and workflows into the platformliliBuild and support machine learning workflows on the platformliliBuild distributed computing frameworks to process dataliliPerforms data analysis required to troubleshoot data related issuesliliBe an innovator and lead development of Intellectual Property of Data SecretsliliDrive innovation at the junction of cloud computing distributed systems data privacy and data sciencesWork closely with the product management team and drive the ML technology amp architectural aspects of the product roadmapliliWork closely with customers to build use cases and requirements for wellintegrated solutionsliliAlign the product with industry security standards data privacy regimes compliancelilirequirements and certifications for each of the focus industry verticalsliliEvangelize Data Secrets in industrywide AI and data privacy forumsliul
